oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: T. W. Miller memorandum, 1918 January 9
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Memorandum to Capt. Bowlus ordering him to take a truck from Toul (France) to Chaumon-sur-Aire and Chaumont. The truck will deliver saddle soap and Stoker mortars.

United States. Army
